Loooooooooove it.......

Just Amazing course! I love the tutor and his style and accent. Everything is cool :D

One thing though, he is using the last version of Illustrator which is CC 2018, I have CC 2017 on my machine, and I found it really hard to follow at the beginning.  I found my self put extra effort on googling how to find things. 

For this tiny part, this course lost a start from my end :)

If I could give a 10 star I would.  I loved learning from this course. He's an excellent teacher, speaks clearly and  exciting to learn from. There were so many useful skills I learnt from him. Just gained much more confidence in Illustrator. Perfect for beginners!!!

The whole course was amazing, even if you know already the overall functionality of Illustrator, the course will give you some tips, tricks and great information and knowledge, about the tools and software that is very useful, Daniel is awesome and very easy to learn with him. Recommended for those starting on the design world and for those who even already know how Adobe Illustrator works.

My only criticism is that I wish the instructor would slow down.  He speaks too fast.  Using the audio option to slow down the speed makes him sound intoxicated.  Otherwise, the course is awesome.  I appreciate having quizzes and assignments.  I had no way of handing in my projects.  He said to go to Twitter and look him up.  I opened a Twitter account for the first time and found the teacher so I left 2 messages for him asking how to submit the homework. What a JOKE. He never got back to me. Relying on social media to hand in homework is UNPROFESSIONAL.   NOT IMPRESSED. Wendi Taylor

Absolutely Amazing! i am using Corel Draw from few years and were looking for some instructor to help me change the software to Adobe Illustrator! i watch a lot of tutorials online but this the best i ever find.
Worth it

The course is absolutely amazing! Daniel explained everything in great details. I recommend it to anyone who is not very familiar to the Adobe Illustrator designing platform. I will be sure to watch his second course named "Adobe Illustrator Mastery". I am so glad I purchased this course and for being a part of this fantastic freelance platform that Fiverr is! Thank you, Dan, you nailed it! :D

Great course.
loving every bit from this course... worth the value

I loved this course!  It was more thorough than I imagined it would be, which was great!  He did a great job of explaining everything.  The file exercises he provided to follow along really are what helped me to practice the techniques as he explained them.  My only semi-negative comment is that once in a while, he talked rather softly, almost like mumbling to himself, and it made it hard to hear those parts.  Luckily, I could replay a part, if needed, to hear him more clearly. I take that as part of filming to a camera rather than an actual audience, so was not too much of a problem and understandable. His demeanor was nice and positive. I like the practice activities he gave to be able to try the techniques on my own. I will be taking his master class shortly. I feel confident in his knowledge and his sharing of tips as well.  Great tutorials!
Another Great course.
Loved It. I was good at illustrator but there were so many small things I was missing. This course was really helpful and amazing.

Good course, the professor teaches at a great pace and explains everything thoroughly and in a way that is easy to understand. The only thing i would improve is the final test at the end, there are a lot of typos and one of the questions involving clipping masks and which image should be in the foreground was a little confusing and hard to decipher. Besides that it was a nice course and i would recommend it to anyone starting out with illustrator.

Definitely recommend to any beginner and/or advanced users looking to expand their knowledge.

Much of these fundamentals can help you better understand vector graphics with any vector art program, which is exactly what I did after finishing this course since I couldn't afford the Adobe software and instead went with a FREE alternative.
